1483380.name: Vertigo Rush
1483380.description:
Vertigo Rush is a virtual reality racing experience that combines speed and parkour in an intense physical challenge. Players control agile robots, propelling them through vast, detailed environments by moving their own arms in a heart-pumping race.

Inspired by the mechanics of classic arcade racing games, each level is crafted to test player’s skill and endurance as they race through Haven's floating cities.

• Competitive Online Multiplayer up to 12 Players in Each Race with Global Ranking System, Time Trial Mode, Character & Robot Customization and Cross-Platform Play.

• Polished full-body physical control for high-speed parkour racing, with fluid and satisfying movement mechanics (jumps, climbing, running) designed for an exhilarating VR experience.

• Immersive and emotionally engaging narrative: In a world divided between floating opulence and terrestrial struggle, two ingenious siblings defy their destiny in robot races to save themselves from oppression and rewrite their future.
1483380.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
